basic.description:
A course which combines study of the history and theory of film animation with the production of animated films. Requirements will include both research essays as well as the conceptualization and production of an animated film.
NOTE    Students may enroll in no more than one production course per academic year: FILM 351/3.0; FILM 352/3.0; FILM 353/3.0; FILM 355/6.0; FILM 365/6.0; FILM 375/6.0; FILM 385/6.0; FILM 410/3.0; FILM 451/3.0; FILM 460/6.0.
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Animation Theory and Practice

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite  A GPA of 2.6 in FILM &[B- in FILM110 (or 104&106)& FILM250] & 6.0 units in FILM &reg in a FILM MajorMed or COFI subplan or STSC Spec Plan.
Exclusion     No more than 1 crse frFILM368; 385
Exclusion    No more than 1 crs fr FILM356; 385
